name: pnp-list-formatting-retail-accounts
title: Retail Accounts
shortDescription: SharePoint lists are excellent places to store information. This example demonstrates how to use a custom SharePoint list to manage retail stores. This sample defines a custom view to bring focus to the status of store locations. It also provides a better visual experience by displaying all the data in an easy to read format by using icons, colors, and Bing maps.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
